seo.title: Manarola Hotels 2025 | Stay in Cinque Terre's Most Iconic Village
seo.description: Find the perfect hotel in Manarola. Sea views, romantic settings, and authentic Italian hospitality in colorful cliffside accommodations.

body.title: Hotels in Manarola
body.subtitle: Stay in the heart of the most photographed village. Charming hotels with sea views, terraces, and authentic Italian character.

features.title: La Torretta Lodge
features.description: Boutique hotel in medieval tower. Rooftop terrace with panoramic views.

features.title: Hotel Marina Piccola
features.description: Family-run hotel by the harbor. Traditional rooms with sea views.

features.title: Ca' d'Andrean
features.description: Charming B&B in restored historic building. Breakfast terrace overlooking the village.

features.title: Residence San Pietro
features.description: Modern apartments with kitchens. Perfect for families and longer stays.

features.title: 5 Terre Backpackers
features.description: Budget-friendly hostel with sunset terrace. Social atmosphere for solo travelers.

features.title: Affittacamere Manarola
features.description: Cozy guest rooms in local homes. Authentic village experience.
